result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Esteban J Cardenas

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Esteban J Cardenas in court.  Attorney Joel Alan Mogren Aty in court for Esteban J Cardenas.  Prosecuting attorney Arthur Kenneth Thexton in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for a final pretrial. Court holds colloquy with parties.  Case remains in trial posture.  Case remains calendared for Jury Trial on November 28, 2022 at 9:00am. 

Parties are advised that effective 10/31/2022, pursuant to Chief Judge Directive 22-17, this case will be reassigned to Branch 37, Judge Dee in Room 515 of the Courthouse.

Defendant Esteban J Cardenas in court with attorney Joel Alan Mogren.  Thomas Hasle appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Case called to lift the stayed bench warrant on the record.  Court informed the parties that the 11/7/2022 jury trial is not available on the court's calendar.   Court ordered case adjourned for jury trial in Branch 13.  Final pretrial remains calendared on 10/13/0222 at 8:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for November 28, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Esteban J Cardenas in court with attorney Joel Alan Mogren.  Thomas Hasle appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Esteban J Cardenas appeared by video means with Attorney.
Case heard off the record due to court reporter availability.
Defense requests final pretrial and jury trial dates. Court scheduled other in court activity to address stayed bench warrant. Case adjourned for final pretrial, jury trial, and other in court activity in Branch 37.
All parties are advised effective August 1, 2022 this case will be assigned to a Branch of RESERVE JUDGES.  Other in-court activity scheduled for August 26, 2022 at 08:30 am.  Final pre-trial scheduled for October 13, 2022 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for November 7, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Esteban J Cardenas in court with attorney Joel Alan Mogren.  Nate Kristian McClure appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 37.   This hearing may be streamed live on Dacast at the Court's discretion:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/3c595ccd-39e3-09d4-8db1-82162d766d4f  Status conference scheduled for July 22, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Joel Alan Mogren in court.  Nate Kristian McClure appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney appeared by video means for .  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a bench warrant issued but stayed the issuance until the next court date in Branch 37.  Calendar call scheduled for June 21, 2022 at 11:00 am.

Defendant Esteban J Cardenas in court with attorney Joel Alan Mogren.  Adam Joseph Best appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Esteban J Cardenas appeared by video means with Attorney.  Deputy court clerk:  vk  Hearing held via zoom/DAcast. Defense has received an offer and needs discovery.    Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 37.   This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/3c595ccd-39e3-09d4-8db1-82162d766d4f  Status conference scheduled for June 6, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Court ordered no possession or use of any dangerous weapons or firearms.

Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with S.L.C.
No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Esteban J Cardenas in court.  Erin Michelle Karshen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant advised that this case is assigned to Judge Dee, Branch 37.
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause. Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel and maximum penalties.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant. Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 right to challenge probable cause and to have complaint read until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance. Defendant IS Public Defender eligible. Defendant is ordered to provide the public defender's office with the next court date.  
The case is adjourned to Br. 37 for a Pretrial Conference.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 14, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant is Out-of-Custody. Court appearance in Out-Of-Custody Court, Room 221 Safety Building on 3/24/22 @ 1p
